burundi.nemba:
(natural)
- 55 is okay but a bit too coarse
- at 45, took 1:45, but fairly strong flavour
- at 25 for 18g/300g

pourover.v60:
24g coffee ground coarsely
20g sugar
400g water at 96C
- 48g bloom
- 288g fast
- 400g slow

alcoholic.espresso martini:
- 60g vodka
- 50g kahlua
- 10g maple syrup
- 36g double espresso
alcoholic.genshu (plum liquer) cocktail:
- 60g genshu
- 30g whisky (Suntory Toki is best)
- 20g lemon lime bitters cordial (red elk)
- 60g yuzu kochi (alcoholic soda, Nippon Chuhi brand)
on lots crushed ice

black.english breakfast (Larry's):
- 1.3g tea leaves / 100g water (85C)
- 4.5min

Pour initial boiling water over tea leaves to bloom, then pour
remaining water in teapot, then steep wet leaves
